Hi Jan


Mmm… I used the units as specified in the man page for gendaylit, it says the default output is in W/m2/sr. All the 146 patches are plotted in the graph, at all time steps during daylight time (there are 146 x 4586 points).


Running exactly the same analysis without the sun in the sky description (-s option in both gendaylit and gendaymtx) led to a more symmetric correlation (attached).


Maybe the assignment of the sun contribution to the three nearest sky patches is done slightly differently in genskyvec and in gendaymtx?


Cheers
Eleonora
